title: Misty Step
content:
Misty Step Level 2 Conjuration Spell Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. 18m Bonus ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Conjuration Spell

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.

Misty Step is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Misty Step is a Level 2 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Misty Step Information

Description: Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Level: 2 School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Misty Step in Baldur's Gate 3

Misty Step can be acquired by the following classes and race(s): Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Circle of the Land: Coast, Circle of the Land: Underdark, Gloom Stalker, Oath of Ancients, Oath of Vengeance Githyanki at Level 5 Misty Step can be cast by using the following items: Amulet of Misty Step Boots of Very Fast Blinking Disintegrating Night Walkers Scroll of Misty Step

Misty Step Tips & Notes for Baldur's Gate 3

Misty Step doesn't trigger Attack of Opportunity but can be Counterspell-ed. Misty Step can be used through anything you can see, including through transparent materials, prison cells, glass and much more, as along as there's something visible from the other side, you can use it to teleport past it, make sure you have enough spell slots for multiple Misty Steps otherwise you will get stuck in the room.
